ABC News Refused to Fact Check Kamala, So We Did... - The National Pulse
While ABC News moderators David Muir and Linsey Davis were busy debating former President Donald J. Trump, they failed to fact-check some blatant falsehoods peddled by Kamala Harris during Tuesday night’s presidential debate in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. Harris made demonstrably false claims on at least nine occasions, with no pushback from the moderators.The National Pulse has […]
